findings.title: A6-13 Project Detail Page status inconsistency
findings.description: ACTIVE.md lists A6-13 as 'Active Task' but data.json shows status 'backlog'
findings.recommendedAction: Sync ACTIVE.md with data.json - either move to In Progress in ACTIVE.md or change data.json status to 'active'
findings.reason: Requires CHAD_YI decision on actual task state

findings.title: A2-12 Chapter 12 feedback status inconsistency
findings.description: data.json shows A2-12 as 'backlog' but escritor/AGENT_STATE.json claims taskStatus is 'review'
findings.recommendedAction: Sync statuses - if Escritor provided analysis, task should be in 'review' workflow state
findings.reason: Requires verification of actual work completion

findings.title: Escritor agent status terminology mismatch
findings.description: Multiple terms used for same state: data.json 'waiting_for_input', AGENT_STATE.json 'not_spawned', current-task.md 'NOT_INITIALIZED'
findings.recommendedAction: Standardize terminology: use 'not_spawned' for configured-but-never-spawned agents
findings.appliedFix: None - cosmetic issue, flagged for standardization

dashboardToActiveMd.details: ACTIVE.md shows 1 active task (A6-13), data.json workflow.active is empty

agentStatusToWorkFiles.details: Escritor status correctly reflects no actual work in current-task.md and MEMORY.md

configuredAgentsToInputsNeeded.details: 3 inputs needed match 3 blocked configured agents (Escritor spawn, OANDA creds, Moomoo creds)
